itunes:title: Quarantine Creativity: Light the SPARK!
title: Quarantine Creativity: Light the SPARK!
description:
What does creativity look like?  Where is it expressed and WHAT do Excel spreadsheets and Marilyn Monroe have to do with it anyway?   Today we share some of our main sources for keeping the spark alive!

Become a PATRON of the the podcast at: Patreon.com/Homemakerchicpodcast.

SHOWNOTES...Books, discount links and more:

Our Lovely Advertisers!

What are YOU sipping today?  Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye!   
Shop and Sip at:  https://bit.ly/DryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic

Sleep Chic!  Get your modern vintage sheets at americanblossomlinens.com with the 20% off promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20

Tuck into a delicious loaf of bread: Order your Jovial Einkorn Flour at jovialfoods.com

Pucker up baby! Grab your red lips and organic skincare here:  toupsandco.com and use the promo code HOMEMAKER for 10% off!



Books we mentioned:
The English Country House:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0865653062?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=0865653062

Perfect English Farmhouse:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1849758786?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=1849758786

City Farmhouse Style: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1419726501?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=1419726501

The Tudor Home:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0847844897?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=0847844897

Perfect English Cottage:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1845979044?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=1845979044

Shows we mentioned: 
Victorian Farm: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1862059004?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=1862059004

All the farms, Victorian, Edwardian and War Time:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008NB6QEC?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B008NB6QEC

Wartime Farm:  https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00KS37I4K?ie=UTF8&tag=homemakerchic-20&camp=1789&linkCode=xm2&creativeASIN=B00KS37I4K
